learningpod.title: Kaplan Kids (Reading): [IMAGE] In this sentence, what could you substitute for the word garrison? [IMAGE] In...

p.b: More than 1,500 troops are stationed at the garrison.

questionBody.p: In this sentence, what could you substitute for the word garrison?

simpleChoice.p: another noun that tells where the troops are stationed
another adjective that describes the troops
another adverb that explains how the troops are stationed
another verb that tells what the troops did
